title: Behold, the New Starting Salary for Some Graduates Is $100,000
sub_head: A roaring recovery and tight labor market make entry-level workers staggeringly valuable in tech, banking and consultingâ€”and not everyone is thrilled
body:
Some college seniors who walk across the stage to collect their diplomas this spring will soon strut into six-figure starting salaries at big tech, finance and consulting firms.
Not everybody is happy about it.
